values.hyperlinkHttpsIImgurComYUIqJezPngUseTheT: =HYPERLINK("https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XsaoiJqSd8hOESCBMD2S8eJfgnvhRhLf/view?usp=sharing","Download the latest version of the sheet")

Hi, welcome to the item spreadsheet for ACNH! This sheet is a newly made version since the old one will no longer be maintained.

Update 4/24: Storage and icon images added for "Other" tab, additional info added to Art tab, minor fixes and name corrections to reflect update.

The purpose of our spreadsheet is to create a complete collection of data on items, villagers, achievements, and more! We fully welcome the use of our data for creators to make websites or applications from for the betterment of the Animal Crossing community. If you use our data for an app or site, please provide a link back to the spreadsheet on your page, and contact us to get your name added to the list of partners.

Feel free to join our Discord if you would like to contribute to the sheet or suggest features. We always appreciate extra hands helping out. We also post more frequent/detailed updates, so I highly recommend joining if you follow the sheet closely.
=HYPERLINK("https://discord.gg/8jNFHxG","Spreadsheet Discord (report issues, find resources, or stop by and say hi!)")
